name: 黃美雪
objective:
線性代數為工程類學科之基礎數學之一，著重於訓練學生矩陣運算及基本數學証明。課程大綱如下：
1. 解聯立方程式
2. 矩陣運算
3. 行列式
4. 向量空間
5. 線性轉換
6. 特徵值及特徵向量
7. 選擇性題材，視時間充許教授下列之一：矩陣數值方法，Jordan form , 或線性規劃
As a basic mathematics in engineering,the course Linear Algebra
emphasizes on the subjest of matrix computation (theory) and the
technique of mathematical proving.The outline of the course 
includes the following:
1.Systems of Linear Equations
2.Matrices
3.Determinants
4.Vector Spaces
5.Linear Transformations
6.Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors
7.Advanced Topics: selet one of the following if time permitted:
  Numerical Techniques in Matrix operations,Jordan form,or   
  Linear Programming.
schedule:
Week 01. Matrices, Vectors and Systems of Linear Equations 
Week 02. Matrices, Vectors and Systems of Linear Equations 
Week 03. Matrices and Linear Transformations 
Week 04. National Day
Week 05. Matrices and Linear Transformations  
Week 06. Determinants  
Week 07. Determinants
Week 08. Subspaces and Their Properties 
Week 09. Midterm Exam
Week 10. Subspaces and Their Properties 
Week 11. Subspaces and Their Properties
Week 12. Eigenvalues, Eigenvectors and Diagonalization 
Week 13. Eigenvalues, Eigenvectors and Diagonalization 
Week 14. Orthogonality 
Week 15. Orthogonality
Week 16. Vector Spaces
Week 17. Vector Spaces
Week 18. Final Exam
materials: L. E. Spence, A. J. Insel, and S. H. Friedberg, Elementary Linear Algebra: A Matrix Approach, 2nd edition, Pearson Education, 2008.
